name: Knuckles Knows da wae
description:
The Ugandan Knuckles have escaped from VR-Chat, we do not know what they say, what they want, but they know the way.

Now you must find your home in this epic platform game.

Jumping and dodging dangerous enemies this fun meme will have to
find a way to Uganda. We do not know why, but they want to go there.

Because knuckles must dodge somic (the blue knuckles) we do not know. Why somic flies, no idea.

You can solve the difficult physics puzzles. Can you avoid the flying somic?

Russian Knuckles added at lastest levels.
